It must be stronger than the one in Rance 03, so there are ornamental objects on the four corners."},{"lineNumber":254417,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これって、私が捕まってイシスが潰された・・","translatedEnglishLine":"So this is what happened when I was captured and Isis was destroyed..."},{"lineNumber":254418,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そうだ、人類がカオス以外で唯一魔人と対抗する手段だ","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, it's humanity's only way, aside from Chaos, to oppose demons."},{"lineNumber":254419,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これすごく痛い、私知っている、早くシルキィを出してあげて　サテラ","translatedEnglishLine":"This really hurts, I know it; Satella, please get Silky out quickly."},{"lineNumber":254420,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まだだ、もう少し弱ってからだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Not yet, wait until she weakens a bit more."},{"lineNumber":254421,"originalJapaneseLine":"しばらくシルキィは結界に捕らわれていたが、だんだん弱っていく","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky was trapped in the barrier for a while but gradually grew weaker."},{"lineNumber":254422,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして鎧が吹き飛ぶ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then her armor is blown away."},{"lineNumber":254423,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、もうそろそろだな・・降参しろ、すれば命だけは助けてやる（貞操はしらんがな）","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, it's about time... Surrender, and I'll spare your life (though I can't guarantee your chastity)."},{"lineNumber":254424,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィはそれを無視し身体が引きちぎられるような衝撃を受けながらも自力で","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky ignores that and, despite the body-shredding shock, uses her strength to"},{"lineNumber":254425,"originalJapaneseLine":"結界を破る（これを突破したのはシルキィが初）","translatedEnglishLine":"break the barrier (Silky is the first to break through this)."},{"lineNumber":254426,"originalJapaneseLine":"私は負ける訳にはいない、ホーネット様の為に・・・と","translatedEnglishLine":"I cannot afford to lose, for Lady Hornet’s sake..."},{"lineNumber":254427,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"},{"lineNumber":254428,"originalJapaneseLine":"ボロボロで動けないシルキィ、手足もぴくりとも動かない","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky is battered and unable to move, not even a twitch of her limbs."},{"lineNumber":254429,"originalJapaneseLine":"がははは、勝ったぞとランスが馬乗りになる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hahaha, I won! The more you resist, the more brutal the slaughter becomes."},{"lineNumber":254441,"originalJapaneseLine":"おとなしく降伏してくれ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Surrender quietly."},{"lineNumber":254442,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうしてくれ・・ホーネット様もそれで助かる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Do so... Lady Hornet will be saved because of it."},{"lineNumber":254443,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラが何か言うが・・シルキィに無視される","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella says something, but Silky ignores her."},{"lineNumber":254444,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":"> Selection"},{"lineNumber":254445,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＞　降伏する","translatedEnglishLine":"> Surrender"},{"lineNumber":254446,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＞　断る","translatedEnglishLine":"> Refuse"},{"lineNumber":254447,"originalJapaneseLine":"降伏する","translatedEnglishLine":"Surrender."},{"lineNumber":254448,"originalJapaneseLine":"当然、ゲームオーバーになります。","translatedEnglishLine":"Naturally, this results in a game over."},{"lineNumber":254449,"originalJapaneseLine":"任せます","translatedEnglishLine":"It's up to you."},{"lineNumber":254450,"originalJapaneseLine":"断る。","translatedEnglishLine":"Refuse."},{"lineNumber":254451,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前、無理矢理戦っているだろう、本意じゃないな。","translatedEnglishLine":"You're fighting against your will, aren't you? This isn’t what you truly want."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほう・・まっすぐリアの居る部屋に向かっているな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh... you're heading straight for the room where Ria is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最短コースか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The shortest course, huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 急いで下さいと誰かが言うが、ランスは余裕
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone says to hurry, but Rance is calm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫だ、全て俺様の計算通りだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's alright, everything is going according to my plan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城の中、魔人が侵入しておおあわらなのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside Leazas Castle, even though demons have invaded causing a big commotion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジュリアが　てへ、ごめんね、さっき魔人をやっつけようと考えて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Julia says, 'Hehe, sorry, I was trying to defeat the demons earlier'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 開けてはいけない禁断の部屋を開けちゃったら・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and opened the forbidden room that shouldn't have been opened...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幽霊がいっぱい出てきて取り返しがつかない事になっちゃた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many ghosts came out and things got completely out of hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、もうこんな時に・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, at a time like this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城玉座
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leazas Castle Throne Room

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、マリスの前に魔人シルキィが現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Silky appears before Ria and Maris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リアは博識なので英雄シルキィの事を知っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria, being knowledgeable, knows about the hero Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのシルキィが、魔物の手先になって人間を滅ぼしにきたのね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That Silky has become an agent of the demons and has come to destroy humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱり人間を裏切ったというのは事実だっただとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So it was true that she betrayed humans after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとでも言うがいい、この戦い終わらせる為に命を頂く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Say whatever you want, but I will take your life to end this battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が来たのが分かっていながら、国王として逃げずにここで構えていた事立派、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's admirable that you knew I was coming but stood your ground here as king without running away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せめてひとおもい逝かせてやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At least I'll give you a swift death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えー、だって、ダーリンが逃げちゃ駄目って、ここにいないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ehh, but darling said I shouldn't run away, and I have to stay here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方がまっすぐに罠にかからないから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because you won't fall right into the trap.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リアに向かって一歩踏み出したシルキィは、魔封印結界（結界志木）にかかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky, who stepped toward Ria, was caught in the magical sealing barrier (Kekkai Shiki).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにランス達が来る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, Rance and others arrive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おお、ナイスタイミングだ、ひっかかっているぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, perfect timing, she's caught in it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダーリン、怖かったよーとリアが甘えてくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Darling, I was scared,' Ria clings sweetly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結界志木の説明・・　ランス０３の時より強固でないといけないのでそれっぽい４隅の置物
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation of the Kekkai Shiki... It must be stronger than the one in Rance 03, so there are ornamental objects on the four corners.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これって、私が捕まってイシスが潰された・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So this is what happened when I was captured and Isis was destroyed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだ、人類がカオス以外で唯一魔人と対抗する手段だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, it's humanity's only way, aside from Chaos, to oppose demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これすごく痛い、私知っている、早くシルキィを出してあげて　サテラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This really hurts, I know it; Satella, please get Silky out quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだだ、もう少し弱ってからだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not yet, wait until she weakens a bit more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらくシルキィは結界に捕らわれていたが、だんだん弱っていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky was trapped in the barrier for a while but gradually grew weaker.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして鎧が吹き飛ぶ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then her armor is blown away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、もうそろそろだな・・降参しろ、すれば命だけは助けてやる（貞操はしらんがな）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, it's about time... Surrender, and I'll spare your life (though I can't guarantee your chastity).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィはそれを無視し身体が引きちぎられるような衝撃を受けながらも自力で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky ignores that and, despite the body-shredding shock, uses her strength to

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結界を破る（これを突破したのはシルキィが初）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: break the barrier (Silky is the first to break through this).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は負ける訳にはいない、ホーネット様の為に・・・と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I cannot afford to lose, for Lady Hornet’s sake...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ボロボロで動けないシルキィ、手足もぴくりとも動かない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky is battered and unable to move, not even a twitch of her limbs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、勝ったぞとランスが馬乗りになる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hahaha, I won! Rance mounts her from above.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両手を掴んで、いやらしい目で見下ろす、余裕綽々のランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Grabbing her hands and looking down with lecherous eyes, a very confident Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっぱいを見て、貧乳だなぁ、よし俺が揉んで育ててやろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking at her breasts, 'They're flat,' he says. 'Alright, I'll fondle and develop them for you.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、隠し持っていた最後の魔導具を発動、小さな隠し手みたいなのが現れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But she activates the last hidden magical tool she had, and a small concealed hand-like thing appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの首に刃を突きつける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It presses a blade against Rance's neck.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここですが、シルキィはもうボロボロ、剣を突きつけてはいますが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this point, Silky is already battered; she is pressing the sword, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 差すだけの力も無い状況です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She doesn't have the strength to actually stab him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いのベテランであるランスは最初、どきっとするがすぐにそれを見切る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, a battle veteran, is momentarily startled but quickly reads through it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前がサテラが言っていた人間の王だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So you are the human king Satella mentioned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝負あったぞ、私の勝ちだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The match is over; I’ve won.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頼む、降伏してくれ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please, surrender.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念だが人類は魔軍には勝てない、抵抗すればするほどより激しい殺戮に合う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unfortunately, humanity cannot defeat the demon army. The more you resist, the more brutal the slaughter becomes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おとなしく降伏してくれ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surrender quietly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうしてくれ・・ホーネット様もそれで助かる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do so... Lady Hornet will be saved because of it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが何か言うが・・シルキィに無視される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella says something, but Silky ignores her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Selection

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　降伏する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Surrender

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　断る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Refuse

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 降伏する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surrender.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当然、ゲームオーバーになります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Naturally, this results in a game over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 任せます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's up to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 断る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Refuse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前、無理矢理戦っているだろう、本意じゃないな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're fighting against your will, aren't you? This isn’t what you truly want.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

This isn’t what you truly want."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほう・・まっすぐリアの居る部屋に向かっているな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh... you're heading straight for the room where Ria is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最短コースか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The shortest course, huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 急いで下さいと誰かが言うが、ランスは余裕
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone says to hurry, but Rance is calm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫だ、全て俺様の計算通りだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's alright, everything is going according to my plan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城の中、魔人が侵入しておおあわらなのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside Leazas Castle, even though demons have invaded causing a big commotion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジュリアが　てへ、ごめんね、さっき魔人をやっつけようと考えて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Julia says, 'Hehe, sorry, I was trying to defeat the demons earlier'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 開けてはいけない禁断の部屋を開けちゃったら・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and opened the forbidden room that shouldn't have been opened...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幽霊がいっぱい出てきて取り返しがつかない事になっちゃた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many ghosts came out and things got completely out of hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、もうこんな時に・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, at a time like this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城玉座
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leazas Castle Throne Room

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、マリスの前に魔人シルキィが現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Silky appears before Ria and Maris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リアは博識なので英雄シルキィの事を知っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria, being knowledgeable, knows about the hero Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのシルキィが、魔物の手先になって人間を滅ぼしにきたのね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That Silky has become an agent of the demons and has come to destroy humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱり人間を裏切ったというのは事実だっただとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So it was true that she betrayed humans after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとでも言うがいい、この戦い終わらせる為に命を頂く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Say whatever you want, but I will take your life to end this battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が来たのが分かっていながら、国王として逃げずにここで構えていた事立派、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's admirable that you knew I was coming but stood your ground here as king without running away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せめてひとおもい逝かせてやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At least I'll give you a swift death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えー、だって、ダーリンが逃げちゃ駄目って、ここにいないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ehh, but darling said I shouldn't run away, and I have to stay here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方がまっすぐに罠にかからないから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because you won't fall right into the trap.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リアに向かって一歩踏み出したシルキィは、魔封印結界（結界志木）にかかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky, who stepped toward Ria, was caught in the magical sealing barrier (Kekkai Shiki).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにランス達が来る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, Rance and others arrive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おお、ナイスタイミングだ、ひっかかっているぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, perfect timing, she's caught in it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダーリン、怖かったよーとリアが甘えてくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Darling, I was scared,' Ria clings sweetly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結界志木の説明・・　ランス０３の時より強固でないといけないのでそれっぽい４隅の置物
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation of the Kekkai Shiki... It must be stronger than the one in Rance 03, so there are ornamental objects on the four corners.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これって、私が捕まってイシスが潰された・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So this is what happened when I was captured and Isis was destroyed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだ、人類がカオス以外で唯一魔人と対抗する手段だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, it's humanity's only way, aside from Chaos, to oppose demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これすごく痛い、私知っている、早くシルキィを出してあげて　サテラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This really hurts, I know it; Satella, please get Silky out quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだだ、もう少し弱ってからだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not yet, wait until she weakens a bit more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらくシルキィは結界に捕らわれていたが、だんだん弱っていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky was trapped in the barrier for a while but gradually grew weaker.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして鎧が吹き飛ぶ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then her armor is blown away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、もうそろそろだな・・降参しろ、すれば命だけは助けてやる（貞操はしらんがな）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, it's about time... Surrender, and I'll spare your life (though I can't guarantee your chastity).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィはそれを無視し身体が引きちぎられるような衝撃を受けながらも自力で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky ignores that and, despite the body-shredding shock, uses her strength to

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結界を破る（これを突破したのはシルキィが初）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: break the barrier (Silky is the first to break through this).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は負ける訳にはいない、ホーネット様の為に・・・と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I cannot afford to lose, for Lady Hornet’s sake...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ボロボロで動けないシルキィ、手足もぴくりとも動かない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky is battered and unable to move, not even a twitch of her limbs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、勝ったぞとランスが馬乗りになる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hahaha, I won! Rance mounts her from above.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両手を掴んで、いやらしい目で見下ろす、余裕綽々のランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Grabbing her hands and looking down with lecherous eyes, a very confident Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっぱいを見て、貧乳だなぁ、よし俺が揉んで育ててやろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking at her breasts, 'They're flat,' he says. 'Alright, I'll fondle and develop them for you.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、隠し持っていた最後の魔導具を発動、小さな隠し手みたいなのが現れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But she activates the last hidden magical tool she had, and a small concealed hand-like thing appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの首に刃を突きつける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It presses a blade against Rance's neck.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここですが、シルキィはもうボロボロ、剣を突きつけてはいますが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this point, Silky is already battered; she is pressing the sword, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 差すだけの力も無い状況です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She doesn't have the strength to actually stab him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いのベテランであるランスは最初、どきっとするがすぐにそれを見切る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, a battle veteran, is momentarily startled but quickly reads through it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前がサテラが言っていた人間の王だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So you are the human king Satella mentioned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝負あったぞ、私の勝ちだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The match is over; I’ve won.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頼む、降伏してくれ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please, surrender.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念だが人類は魔軍には勝てない、抵抗すればするほどより激しい殺戮に合う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unfortunately, humanity cannot defeat the demon army. The more you resist, the more brutal the slaughter becomes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おとなしく降伏してくれ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surrender quietly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうしてくれ・・ホーネット様もそれで助かる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do so... Lady Hornet will be saved because of it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが何か言うが・・シルキィに無視される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella says something, but Silky ignores her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Selection

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　降伏する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Surrender

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　断る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Refuse

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 降伏する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surrender.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当然、ゲームオーバーになります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Naturally, this results in a game over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 任せます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's up to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 断る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Refuse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前、無理矢理戦っているだろう、本意じゃないな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're fighting against your will, aren't you? This isn’t what you truly want.
